description: Production-representative temporal-star vault. 50% daily notes, skewed entity distribution, short codes, habit hubs, high orphan rate.

notes.content:
## Habits
- Quick Sketching practice in my notebook
- Running around the neighborhood this evening
- Did my morning [[Yoga]] session
- Took my Supplements with breakfast

## Work
Nadia Reyes flagged an incident in MobileNexus. Quick React fix applied.
Paired with Owen Park on NovaSpark Docker refactoring.
Dmitri Sokolov and I discussed the Microservices approach for FlowStart.
Ran chaos engineering on PayStream before the stg deployment.

notes.title: Meeting Notes 1
notes.content:
# Meeting: DevHub

Attendees: Nadia Reyes, Owen Park

## Discussion
Discussed progress on DevHub. The team is evaluating GraphQL for the backend migration.

Nadia Reyes raised concerns about the Clean Architecture approach.
Owen Park confirmed the timeline aligns with the sprint goals.

## Action Items
- Nadia Reyes to prototype GraphQL integration
- Review Staging requirements

notes.title: Meeting Notes 2
notes.content:
# Meeting: MobileNexus

Attendees: Owen Park, Nadia Reyes

## Discussion
Discussed progress on MobileNexus. The team is evaluating Node.js for the backend migration.

Owen Park raised concerns about the DevOps approach.
Nadia Reyes confirmed the timeline aligns with the on-call goals.

## Action Items
- Owen Park to prototype Node.js integration
- Review UAT requirements

notes.title: Meeting Notes 3
notes.content:
# Meeting: MobileNexus

Attendees: Mira Okonkwo, Leo Vasquez

## Discussion
Discussed progress on MobileNexus. The team is evaluating Python for the backend migration.

Mira Okonkwo raised concerns about the API-First approach.
Leo Vasquez confirmed the timeline aligns with the canary release goals.

## Action Items
- Mira Okonkwo to prototype Python integration
- Review JWT requirements

notes.title: Meeting Notes 4
notes.content:
# Meeting: DevHub

Attendees: Freya Nakamura, Owen Park

## Discussion
Discussed progress on DevHub. The team is evaluating Node.js for the backend migration.

Freya Nakamura raised concerns about the Clean Architecture approach.
Owen Park confirmed the timeline aligns with the backlog goals.

## Action Items
- Freya Nakamura to prototype Node.js integration
- Review JWT requirements

notes.title: Meeting Notes 5
notes.content:
# Meeting: PulseBoard

Attendees: Amara Diallo, Owen Park

## Discussion
Discussed progress on PulseBoard. The team is evaluating React for the backend migration.

Amara Diallo raised concerns about the API-First approach.
Owen Park confirmed the timeline aligns with the planning goals.

## Action Items

- Review RAG requirements

Dmitri Sokolov confirmed the timeline aligns with the feature flag goals.

- Review UAT requirements

notes.title: Meeting Notes 7
notes.content:
# Meeting: CloudShift

Dmitri Sokolov confirmed the timeline aligns with the architecture decision goals.

## Action Items
- Amara Diallo to prototype TypeScript integration
- Review SDK requirements

Owen Park confirmed the timeline aligns with the chaos engineering goals.

# Meeting: NovaSpark

Attendees: Tessa Liu, Mira Okonkwo

notes.title: Project Doc 11
notes.content:
# PayStream Technical Overview

## Stack
Built on Redis, React, Kafka. Deployed to rag.

## Architecture
Uses Observability pattern. Nadia Reyes designed the initial code review pipeline.

Integrates with GridPoint Inc APIs via FlowStart.

notes.title: Project Doc 12
notes.content:
# NovaSpark Technical Overview

## Stack
Built on TypeScript, AWS, Docker. Deployed to rag.

## Architecture
Uses DevOps pattern. Amara Diallo designed the initial architecture decision pipeline.

Integrates with Quantum Data APIs via ConfigForge.

notes.title: Project Doc 13
notes.content:
# PipeFlow Technical Overview

## Stack
Built on React, AWS, GraphQL. Deployed to mcp.

## Architecture
Uses DevOps pattern. Tessa Liu designed the initial chaos engineering pipeline.

Integrates with Meridian Labs APIs via FinderX.

notes.title: Project Doc 14
notes.content:
# CloudShift Technical Overview

## Stack
Built on Kubernetes, React, AWS. Deployed to mcp.

## Architecture
Uses Clean Architecture pattern. Amara Diallo designed the initial backlog pipeline.

Integrates with Meridian Labs APIs via NovaSpark.

notes.title: Project Doc 15
notes.content:
# FinderX Technical Overview

## Stack
Built on Docker, TypeScript, Terraform. Deployed to uat.

## Architecture
Uses Agile pattern. Tessa Liu designed the initial code review pipeline.

Uses Clean Architecture pattern. Amara Diallo designed the initial sprint pipeline.

## Stack
Built on GraphQL, PostgreSQL, Redis. Deployed to rag.

## Architecture
Uses Observability pattern. Leo Vasquez designed the initial backlog pipeline.

Integrates with Apex Systems APIs via WatchTower.

notes.title: Project Doc 18
notes.content:
# NovaSpark Technical Overview

## Stack
Built on Terraform, Kubernetes, Node.js. Deployed to mcp.

## Architecture
Uses Clean Architecture pattern. Mira Okonkwo designed the initial demo pipeline.

Integrates with SkyForge APIs via ConfigForge.

notes.title: Guide 19
notes.content:
# Terraform Best Practices

## Overview
Terraform is used across several projects including PipeFlow.

## Integration with Node.js
When combining Terraform with Node.js, follow the Clean Architecture patterns.

Mira Okonkwo documented the documentation process.

notes.content:

Docker is used across several projects including FinderX.

## Integration with Kubernetes
When combining Docker with Kubernetes, follow the Clean Architecture patterns.

Dmitri Sokolov documented the code review process.

notes.title: Runbook 25
notes.content:
# PulseBoard Runbook

## Deployment
Deploy to stg first, then promote to rag.

## Monitoring
Check Kafka for Clean Architecture.
Contact Mira Okonkwo for escalations.

## Recovery
If demo occurs, follow demo process.

# Nadia Reyes

Nadia Reyes is a team member at Meridian Labs.
Works on various projects using modern tech.
